Timing, place and number of postnatal care contacts
1. For women who give birth in health facilities in resource-limited settings and their 
newborns (P), does discharge from hospital within 24 or 48 hours of birth (I) 
compared with discharge any time later (C) increase the risk of maternal or neonatal 
readmissions for morbidity and stopping breastfeeding at six weeks or six months 
after birth (O)?
